ca.foc.controller

Class PantryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.foc.controller.PantryController

  • @RestController
public class PantryController
extends java.lang.Object
    PantryController - ca.foc.controller.PantryController PantryController- invokes PantryService class to process pantry related tasks, and then redirects to the front end. this controller only works when a member is logged in
    Author:
    Claudia Rivera, Mariia Voronina Implementation- Mariia Voronina Configuration to send and get request from and to back end. Claudia Rivera

      • createPantry

        @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000")
 @PostMapping(value="/createPantry")
public Pantry createPantry(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                Pantry pantry)
        Create pantry
        Parameters:
        pantry - object with attributes to save the pantry: Patry name, Pantry description
        Returns:
        Pantry created

      • deletePantry

        @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000")
 @DeleteMapping(value="/deletepantry/{id}")
 @ResponseBody
 @Transactional
public boolean deletePantry(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                         int id)
        Delete pantry
        Parameters:
        id - is the pantryId to be deleted
        Returns:
        true if the pantry was successfully deleted, otherwise false.

public java.util.List<Pantry> getUserPantries(@PathVariable

        email, - Member email
        Returns:
        List of pantries belong to the same member

      • addProductToPantry

        @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000")
 @PostMapping(value="/pantryproduct/{pantryId}/{productId}/{regionId}/{coordinates}")
 @ResponseBody
public boolean addProductToPantry(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                        int pantryId,
                                                                                                                                                                                        @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                        int productId,
                                                                                                                                                                                        @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                        int regionId,
                                                                                                                                                                                        @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String coordinates)
        Add a product to Pantry. A product must be identified by PantryId, ProductId and regionId
        Parameters:
        pantryId. - Pantry Id
        productId. - Id of the product
        regionId. - Id of the regions
        coordinates. - Location on the map
        Returns:
        True if product was added, false otherwise

      • deleteProductFromPantry

        @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000")
 @DeleteMapping(value="/deleteproduct/{pantryId}/{productId}/{regionId}")
 @ResponseBody
 @Transactional
public boolean deleteProductFromPantry(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                  int pantryId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                  @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                  int productId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                  @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                  int regionId)
        Delete a product from a pantry. A product must be identified by PantryId, ProductId and regionId
        Parameters:
        pantryId. - Pantry Id
        productId. - Id of the product
        regionId. - Id of the regions
        Returns:
        boolean true if the pantry was deleted. false otherwise
